definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: Hayfever is caused by people's immune system reacting to pollen.
sentences.chinese: 人體的免疫系統對花粉做出反應，導致了花粉熱。

sentences.english: The late spring delayed the start of the hay fever season by a fewweeks.
sentences.chinese: 遲到的春天使花粉熱季節延遲了幾個星期。

sentences.english: Hateful hateful english pollen, it?brought hay fever out of me.
sentences.chinese: 討厭的英格蘭花粉，它引發了我的花粉熱。

sentences.english: I think I have hay fever.
My hayfever is under control without over the counter medicines.
sentences.chinese: 我的花粉熱在沒有用西藥的情況下得到控制。

sentences.english: A healthy diet for allergies and hayfever protects you in many ways.
sentences.chinese: 針對過敏和花粉熱的健康飲食在多方面爲您提供防護。

sentences.english: With the hay fever season once more upon us, it's time to meet the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 花粉熱季節再次光臨，我們該會會敵人了。
